title: Outreach to CNCF (Cloud Native Computing Foundation) via email
content:
Subject: Exploring Collaboration — MPLP (Multi-Agent Lifecycle Protocol) × CNCF (Cloud Native Computing Foundation)

Dear CNCF (Cloud Native Computing Foundation) Team,

I'm reaching out from the MPLP (Multi-Agent Lifecycle Protocol) project — MPLP — The Agent OS Protocol.

Introduce MPLP (Multi-Agent Lifecycle Protocol) and explore partnership opportunities.

We believe CNCF (Cloud Native Computing Foundation), as a leading foundation organization, shares our commitment to Universal protocol = write once, run on any compliant runtime. W3C-style tracing. Git-like state snapshots..

I'd welcome the opportunity to discuss how MPLP (Multi-Agent Lifecycle Protocol) could complement CNCF (Cloud Native Computing Foundation)'s work in serving developers.

Best regards,
MPLP (Multi-Agent Lifecycle Protocol) Project
https://mplp.io
